content:
github-actions[bot] opened issue #3576:

serde_cbor is unmaintained

Details
Status unmaintained
Package serde_cbor
Version 0.11.2
URL https://github.com/pyfisch/cbor
Date 2021-08-15

The serde_cbor crate is unmaintained. The author has archived the github repository.

Alternatives proposed by the author:

*ciborium
*minicbor

See advisory page for additional details.

pchickey commented on issue #3576:

This is a transitive dependency via criterion. Updating from the current criterion 0.3.4 to 0.3.5 does not drop this dep. Given that its only matters for benchmarking, I don't think we need to take any urgency in resolving this, and let criterion get around to updating when it can.

bjorn3 commented on issue #3576:

Criterion 0.4.0 which was released September last year drops the serde_cbor dependency.

alexcrichton closed issue #3576:

serde_cbor is unmaintained

Details
Status unmaintained
Package serde_cbor
Version 0.11.2
URL https://github.com/pyfisch/cbor
Date 2021-08-15

The serde_cbor crate is unmaintained. The author has archived the github repository.

Alternatives proposed by the author:

*ciborium
*minicbor

See advisory page for additional details.

alexcrichton commented on issue #3576:

This is no longer in Wasmtime's dependency graph so I'm going to close this.
